name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TomTom POI/GPX Extractor & Favorites to POI (OV2) Converter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract and convert POI/GPX Data from https://plan.tomtom.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension facilitates the extraction and conversion of your favorites from https://plan.tomtom.com into ov2 or json.gz formats.

How to Use:

Register on https://plan.tomtom.com with your account credentials. Please note, this extension functions exclusively when the https://plan.tomtom.com tab is active.

Conversion Options:

• Manually convert and download as OV2, then import into "TomTom Plan/My Items/Places/POI Files/Import OV2 File."

• Alternatively, utilize the Convert & Upload to POI files feature for direct conversion. A new POI File with the name "_favorite-(current date, e.g., 21032024).ov2" will be uploaded.

Notification and Activation:

Your TomTom device will notify you once your places have been updated. Subsequently, activate the new POI list through either of the following paths:

• Settings > Appearance > Show PDI list on map
• Settings > Map & Display > Show on map > Points of Interest

Verification:

Zoom in on one of your favorite locations on your TomTom device and verify the presence of a double pin. This indicates successful conversion and upload of the POI. Once confirmed, you can safely delete favorites manually.

FAQ:
Q: Inconsistencies between TomTom Plan and TomTom Device Favorite Locations
A: Discrepancies may occur when plan.tomtom.com adjusts the point's latitude and longitude to the nearest street address if saved without an address on the device.

Q: Security Concerns
A: This extension utilizes public API data provided by TomTom. All requests are handled client-side, ensuring no data leaks can occur. It is advisable to create a backup of your POI/GPX data before usage.

Q: Supported Languages
A: English, French, German, Italian, Romanian, Spanish.

⚠️ NOTICE
